channel.title: Drafts on Boettiger Group
channel.description: Recent content in Drafts on Boettiger Group

item.description: library(tidyverse) library(jsonlite) #library(printr) knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment="") options(stringsAsFactors=FALSE) x <- data.frame(driver = c("Bowser", "Peach"), occupation = c("Koopa", "Princess")) x$vehicle <- data.frame(model = c("Piranha Prowler", "Royal Racer")) x$vehicle$stats <- data.frame(speed = c(55, 34), weight = c(67, 24), drift = c(35, 32)) dat <- toJSON(x, pretty = TRUE) dat [ { "driver": "Bowser", "occupation": "Koopa", "vehicle": { "model": "Piranha Prowler", "stats": { "speed": 55, "weight": 67, "drift": 35 } } }, { "driver": "Peach", "occupation": "Princess", "vehicle": { "model": "Royal Racer", "stats": { "speed": 34, "weight": 24, "drift": 32 } } } ] df <- fromJSON(dat) df driver occupation vehicle.
